name: 洪進明
objective:
1. Theoretical research on International Marketing.
2. The analysis of international market.  The major contents are the situations and knowledge during the market development.
3. To enhance the view of the students on the international trade affairs.
4. The course will discuss the concept of regional economic integration.
5. The markets studied include North America, Latin America, Europe, Asia, etc.
6. The strategy for businessmen to develop the international market.
schedule:
1st week: Introduction for international marketing
2nd week: Marketing for North American area, Case study.
3rd week: Marketing for North American area, Case study.
4th week: Marketing for North American area, Case study.
5th week: Marketing for North American area, Case study.
6th week: Marketing for Middle East area, Case study.
7th week: Marketing for Middle East area, Case study.
8th week: Marketing for Middle East area, Case study.
9th week: Midterm Examination

11th week: Marketing for Latin American area, Case study, Incoterms.
12th week: Marketing for European area, Case study, Incoterms.
13th week: Marketing for European area, Case study, Incoterms.
14th week: Marketing for European area, Case study, Incoterms.
15th week: Marketing for Asian area, Case study, Incoterms.
16th week: Marketing for Asian area, Case study, Incoterms.
17th week: Marketing for Asian area, Case study, Incoterms.
